metadata.title: CVE-2022-24675 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
encoding/pem in Go before 1.17.9 and 1.18.x before 1.18.1 has a Decodestack overflow via a large amount of PEM data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-24675` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.18 - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
golang-1.18-go - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
golang-1.18-src - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.18 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.1').
